title: The Ninth Secret Bureau - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Ecchi   Fantasy   Martial Arts
author: 姓易的
description:
“If we want people in this world to live in the sun and stay sane, we would have to keep the populace in the dark about secrets that shouldn’t be known to them.”

“Because, once they see the horrors that cannot be explained by existing science, they would discover the horrors of this world….. Believe me, the earth will become the largest madhouse in the universe.”

Chen Idle of the Ninth Secret Bureau>
